name: A brief visit to the gallery
name_original: A brief visit to the gallery
description:
My submission to inkJam 2022.

It uses the pixel art palette ENDESGA 32 by ENDESGA.

Inspired by:

  • Egon Schiele
  • Dante Gabriel Rosetti (the little I can remember of him from uni)
  • the pressure of the jam's time limit

Vaguely influenced by (i. e. in the inescapable shadow of):

  • Kentucky Route Zero: Act I (2013) by Cardboard Computer
  • The Beginner's Guide (2015) by Everything Unlimited
  • Immortality (2022) by Half Mermaid
